name: Nightork Adventures - Beyond the Moons of Shadalee
summary: Nightork Adventures - Beyond the Moons of Shadalee is an arcade shooter game. You fly with a spaceship through procedurally generated caves and fight against evil demons using magic colors. There is a campaign of 30 levels and 6 boss monsters. It also comes with a level editor, so you can create your own caves and missions.
